[ library(test_util) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

test_info(+File,+Info)

Runs all the test patterns in File, printing the Info string in test_csv_log.

See Also

test / 1, should_give / 2, should_fail / 1, should_throw / 2, should_raise / 2, should_give / 3, should_fail / 2, should_throw / 3, should_raise / 3
